recipes.name: omlette
recipe: Whisk eggs, water, salt and pepper.

Spray 8-inch (20 cm) non-stick skillet with
cooking spray. ...

When eggs are almost set on surface but still
look moist, cover half of omelette with filling.

Cook for a minute, then slide omelette onto
plate.

(Nutrients per serving as per without
filling)

recipes.name: pizza
recipe: Preheat oven to 450 degrees F(230 degrees C)
In a medium bowl, dissolve yeast and sugar in warm water.
Stir in flour, salt and oil.Beat until smooth.Let rest for 5 minutes.
Turn dough out onto a light floured surface and pat or roll into a round.
